DOC.brief_summary: The pilot study conduct form open prospective single-arm observational study 28 patient receive physiotherapy Spiraldynamik® Med Center Zurich .
DOC.detailed_description: The pilot study conduct form open prospective single-arm observational study . The data 28 patient receive physiotherapy Spiraldynamik® Med Center Zurich evaluate . The endpoint Visual Analog Scale Foot Ankle ( VAS FA ) , Activity Index ( AI ) , plantar inter-metatarsal pres-sure pain , rearfoot angle dorsal extension capability upper ankle joint individually compare analyzed therapy .
